The Night Before

Movie |

New York City | Christmas Party

  • Release Date: 20 Nov 2015
  • Genre(s): Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
  • Language(s): English
  • Director(s): Jonathan Watson, Sandi Greenberg, Julia Croon, Jonathan Levine
  • Cast(s): Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Seth Rogen, Anthony Mackie, Lizzy Caplan, Jillian Bell See all Cast & Crew
  • Duration: 1h 41min
  • Music: Marco Beltrami,Gabe Hilfer,Christof Gebert,Miles Hankins,Michael Babcock
  • Award(s): IGN 2015 (Nominated) Awards List
  • Similar To: Shazam! Fury of the Gods, Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
  • Story:
    In New York City for their annual tradition of Christmas Eve debauchery, three lifelong best friends set out to find the Holy Grail of Christmas parties since their yearly reunion might be coming to an end.
    Full Story
6.4/10

The Night Before - Where to Stream?

Yay! The movie is available for streaming online and you can stream The Night Before movie on Netflix. However, you can also buy the movie The Night Before on Apple TV Plus starting from Rs 190. You can also rent the movie The Night Before on Apple TV Plus starting from Rs 120.

STORY AND RATINGS

TRIVIA AND POPULAR DIALOGUES

Trivia

Director Jonathan Levine revealed on Collider that a lot of the film's comedy was improvised, and the dramatic moments were per the written script, which he admitted was more like an outline guide.

In the limousine, Isaac, played by Seth Rogen, calls Ethan "Joseph." Ethan is played by Joseph Gordon-Levitt.

There are many references to Die Hard (1988), including a character who likes to imitate Hans Gruber, the music to Ludwig van Beethoven's 9th Symphony, and characters singing Run-D.M.C.'s "Christmas in Hollis."

The nude photos were provided by a body double.

Some of this movie was filmed in August. The cast said they felt really hot in the Christmas sweaters they had to wear outdoors in summer.

Popular Dialogues

"[Isaac is running out of the church after vomiting] Isaac: WE DID NOT KILL JESUS! WE DID NOT KILL JESUS!"

"Isaac: [when he gets a World's Smallest Cock mug] You knew!"
